txt.en:
'The Angmarim are savage men whose cruelty knows no bounds. The corpses in these cages are of Rangers who attempted to bargain with Angmar to preserve whatever of Annúminas they could.

'In response, the Angmarim hung them in these cages until they died, and now they leave their corpses there for the birds and animals to devour.

'Let us get them out of there and allow them to rest peacefully. Even if you tried to make a deal with the Enemy, you do not deserve this for eternity.'
'Now they can spend the rest of time in peace.'
The Rangers here tried to bargain and make deals with Angmar.
Removed the corpses from the cages ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Remove the corpses from the cages ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The corpses should be removed from the crow's cages to allow the fallen to rest peacefully.
Orchalwë will be pleased to see his dishonoured brethren will now rest peacefully.
